inebriants.name: name0
inebriants.description: In alpha-6 the padding and margin changed and now pt-3, for example, is much smaller than it used to be (in alpha 5/4, etc.). In mdb, however, mb- mt- pb- pt- still have the old sizes. In my workflow, for example, I work on pure bootstrap 4 alpha 6 and when I apply mdb everything needs to be adjusted back. Do you plan on synchronizing padding and margin properties with alpha 6 any time soon? I hate doing the same work over and over again.

books.name: React Router
books.description: Declarative, component based routing for React

resources.name: URL Parameters
resources.description: URL parameters are parameters whose values are set dynamically in a page's URL. This allows a route to render the same component while passing that component the dynamic portion of the URL so it can change based off of it.

resources.name: Programatically navigate
resources.description: When building an app with React Router, eventually you'll run into the question of navigating programmatically. The goal of this post is to break down the correct approaches to programmatically navigating with React Router.

books.name: React.js
books.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

resources.name: React Lifecycle Events
resources.description: React Lifecycle events allow you to tie into specific phases of a component's life cycle

resources.name: React AHA Moments
resources.description: A collection of 'Aha' moments while learning React.

books.name: Functional Programming
books.description: In computer science, functional programming is a programming paradigm—a style of building the structure and elements of computer programs—that treats computation as the evaluation of mathematical functions and avoids changing-state and mutable data.

resources.name: Imperative vs Declarative programming
resources.description: A guide to understanding the difference between Imperative and Declarative programming.

resources.name: Building User Interfaces with Pure Functions and Function Composition
resources.description: A guide to building UI with pure functions and function composition in React
